summary.para: Notifies a client that the mode of a display has changed.

param.name: hMonitor
param.para: The display that has a changing mode.

param.name: previousMode
param.para: The previous mode of hMonitor, which may be MAV_UNKNOWN if the client was unaware of the display previously.

param.name: currentMode
param.para: The current mode of hMonitor, which will not be MAV_UNKNOWN.

summary.para: Notifies a client that visibility of the Start screen has changed.

param.name: currentVisibleState
param.para: TRUE if the Start screen is displayed; otherwise, FALSE.

summary.para: Enables applications to receive notifications of state changes in a display and of changes in Start screen visibility.
